column1: '''Brent McIntyre''' played the [[Witch-king]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] film trilogy
column2: in the scenes when the character is hooded (as a "[[Nazgûl|Black Rider]]"). He also portrayed the Witch-king in the "[[Wraith-world]]" during the [[Weathertop]] scene in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring|The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.

column1: When the Witch-king battled [[Éowyn]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''
column2: the role was played by [[Lawrence Makoare]].
Brent McIntyre was the tallest actor in the films.
